title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-j - Order of retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-j - Order of retention

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-j
12/88
ORDER OF RETENTION
________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________x
IN THE MATTER
OF
The Application for an Order
of Retention Pursuant to the ORDER OF
RETENTION
Criminal Procedure Law
of Indictment No. ________
________
An Incapacitated Person
________x

The above named defendant, under indictment
for or convicted of the felony of ________, in violation of ________, having
been adjudicated an incapacitated person and committed to the custody of the

Commissioner of (OMH) (OMRDD) for placement in an appropriate facility, by
court order dated ________, and such defendant being now in the custody of said

Commissioner and confined in
____________ facility located at
____________
(Strike out the following paragraph if this is
the first order of retention)
AND further court order or orders of retention
of said defendant having been made on the following dates: ____________
____________
AND application having been received from the
person in charge of the facility where the defendant is confined for an order
of retention of said defendant, notice of such application having been given to
the defendant, the District Attorney, and the Mental Hygiene Legal

Service. (Strike out one of the following two
paragraphs)
AND no motion for a hearing having been
made, AND a hearing having been held on the ________
day of ________ and the following persons having appeared ____________
____________
____________
____________
AND it appearing to my satisfaction that the
said defendant as a result of mental disease or defect lacks capacity to
understand the proceedings against (him) (her) or to assist in (his) (her)own
defense, AND it appearing further that the maximum term
of imprisonment for the highest class of felony charged in the indictment
against the defendant or for the highest class of felony of which the defendant
was convicted is ________ years, that two thirds of such authorized maximum
term of imprisonment is ________ years, ________ months, ________ days, and
that the aggregate of the periods for which the defendant was authorized to be
retained pursuant to the order of commitment and orders of retention is, as of
the date of this order, ________ years, ________ months, ________ days and the
aggregate of the periods of escape from custody is, as of the date of this
order, ________ years, ________ months, ________ days, NOW, THEREFORE, it is
ORDERED that the above named defendant is
hereby adjudicated to be an incapacitated person and shall be retained in the
custody of the Commissioner of the (OMH) (OMRDD) for care and treatment in an
appropriate facility operated by the (OMH) (OMRDD) to be designated by the
appropriate Commissioner, for a period not to exceed ________ years, ________
months, ________ days from the date of this order, and it is further
ORDERED that if the person in charge of the
facility in which the defendant is confined determines that the defendant is no
longer an incapacitated person, such person shall give notice in writing of
such determination to the court and to the District Attorney. Dated: ________
_________
Judge or Justice
